original_text: So the saying spread abroad among the brothers that this disciple was not to die; yet Jesus did not say to him that he was not to die, but, “If it is my will that he remain until I come, what is that to you?”
korean_text: 이 말씀이 형제들에게 나가서 그 제자는 죽지 아니하겠다 하였으나 예수의 말씀은 그가 죽지 않겠다 하신 것이 아니라 내가 올 때까지 그를 머물게 하고자 할지라도 네게 무슨 상관이냐 하신 것이러라

sentences.original_text: So the saying spread abroad among the brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 말이 형제들 사이에 퍼졌습니다

sentences.original_text: that this disciple was not to die
yet Jesus did not say to him
that he was not to die
that he remain until I come
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 내가 올 때까지 머무는 것이
